user_query: I want to know the CO2 offset compensation details for my friend. Can you retrieve the compensation information linked to their account? I need to know the compensation ID, organization, CO2 equivalent, and the details of any gold standard credit and planted trees associated with it.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the user's account information to identify the associated compensation details.
Query the compensation information linked to the friend's account, including compensation ID and organization.
Fetch the CO2 equivalent associated with the identified compensation.
Retrieve details about gold standard credits linked to the compensation.
Get information on planted trees associated with the compensation.
